member.name: T:Game.NavmeshAgent
member.summary: NavmeshAgent is a script/component that allows to set the destination and calculation of a path of an AI agent inside a Navmesh

member.name: M:Game.NavmeshAgent.SetDestination(FlaxEngine.Vector3,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to calculate a path, returning true if one is found and false if none was found

member.name: M:Game.NavmeshAgent.MoveAlongPath
member.summary:
Moves Actor along path.
Returns true if agent is moving, and false if there is no path or if the agent has reached its destination

member.name: T:Game.Extensions
member.summary: Useful or missing extensions for the Flax Engine

member.name: M:Game.Extensions.FindScriptInParent``1(FlaxEngine.Actor)
member.summary: Recursively searches for a script of type T in the parent hierarchy of the provided actor.

member.name: M:Game.Extensions.FindScriptInParent``1(FlaxEngine.Actor,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds a script of type T in the parent hierarchy of the provided actor.

member.name: M:Game.Extensions.FindScriptsInChildren``1(FlaxEngine.Actor)
member.summary: Finds all script components of type T in the children hierarchy of the provided actor.

member.name: M:Game.Extensions.HasAnyTag(FlaxEngine.Actor,FlaxEngine.Tag[])
member.summary: Checks if an actor has any of the specified tags from an array of Tag objects.

member.name: M:Game.Extensions.HasAnyTag(FlaxEngine.Actor,System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if an actor has any of the specified tags from an array of string Tags.

member.name: M:FlaxEvent.RemoveListener(System.Action)
member.summary: Removes the subscription of a class method to this event

member.name: M:FlaxEvent.ClearAllListeners
member.summary: Removes all subscribers of this event

member.summary: Return a random integer value between or equals to the Min and Max values

member.summary: Generates a random value inside a unit circle
